title: citta nimmatiyilE
sahitya:
citta nimmatiyilE tittikkum uNarvAna divya paramjyOtiyE


anupallavi

  bhakti paravashattAl shuddha yOgigaL kANum pashupati jagapati parama dayAnidhiyE


caraNam    mugguNat-tiriyinri tiraiyinri mummalak-karaiyinri muppuDit-taLaiyinri muttozhil viLaivinri
shikkilA sahaja dhyAnattilE vaLarum tEjOnmayamAna dEvAdi dEvanE
